医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
调查：没有足够的资源来满足儿科预防性心脏病护理的需求越来越多的青少年正在出现健康状况，可能会增加成年后过早患心血管疾病的风险，因此，早期筛查、诊断和多学科护理至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Survey-Not-enough-resources-available-to-meet-the-needs-for-pediatric-preventive-cardiology-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Survey-Not-enough-resources-available-to-meet-the-needs-for-pediatric-preventive-cardiology-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c666c0f5-0437-49c3-9d0d-766c6e74d8f7 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 14:12:33 -0400 Survey: Not enough resources available to meet the needs for pediatric preventive cardiology care
新的人工智能模块促进结肠镜检查图像中的息肉分割研究人员开发了一对模块，可以促进人工神经网络的使用，以识别结肠镜检查图像中潜在的癌性生长，而结肠镜检查图像传统上受到结肠镜检查插入和旋转过程本身产生的图像噪声的困扰。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/New-AI-modules-boost-polyp-segmentation-in-colonoscopy-imagery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/New-AI-modules-boost-polyp-segmentation-in-colonoscopy-imagery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93658bec-453d-46ff-90fe-86fe95a9f149 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 13:38:41 -0400 New AI modules boost polyp segmentation in colonoscopy imagery
UKHSA 推出世界领先的疫苗开发和评估中心英国卫生安全局 (UKHSA) 今天推出了世界领先的疫苗开发和评估中心 (VDEC)，该中心正在利用其大流行遗产，帮助英国和世界各地开发拯救生命的新疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/UKHSA-unveils-world-leading-Vaccine-Development-and-Evaluation-Centre.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/UKHSA-unveils-world-leading-Vaccine-Development-and-Evaluation-Centre.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8517dfab-4744-405e-8bef-e55243ea56fb Mon, 07 Aug 2023 13:13:13 -0400 UKHSA unveils world-leading Vaccine Development and Evaluation Centre
空气污染与老年人非肺癌风险增加有关哈佛大学陈曾熙公共卫生学院领导的一项研究表明，长期接触细颗粒空气污染物 (PM2.5) 和二氧化氮 (NO2) 可能会增加老年人患非肺癌的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Air-pollution-linked-to-increased-risk-of-non-lung-cancer-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Air-pollution-linked-to-increased-risk-of-non-lung-cancer-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13493114-1a41-4e77-996c-8e1d759365db Mon, 07 Aug 2023 13:08:21 -0400 Air pollution linked to increased risk of non-lung cancer in older adults
研究发现，人们对睡眠质量的看法会极大地影响他们的健康华威大学领导的研究发现，人们对睡眠的感觉对他们的健康的影响比睡眠追踪技术对他们的睡眠质量的影响更大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Peoples-perception-of-sleep-quality-can-greatly-impact-their-well-being-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Peoples-perception-of-sleep-quality-can-greatly-impact-their-well-being-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02f124c0-e878-45ee-a8f1-d359c61a3b4a Mon, 07 Aug 2023 12:51:16 -0400 People's perception of sleep quality can greatly impact their well-being, study finds
德克萨斯州的审判如何改变了美国堕胎权的故事在罗伊诉韦德案之后的五年里，全国各州的诉讼接二连三地削弱了堕胎权。一次又一次，上法庭捍卫这些权利的人都是医生，他们经常用临床和抽象的术语说话。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/How-the-Texas-Trial-changed-the-story-of-abortion-rights-in-America.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/How-the-Texas-Trial-changed-the-story-of-abortion-rights-in-America.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0136aa68-ab4e-4c04-b294-4a6bc26bd3ed Mon, 07 Aug 2023 12:03:00 -0400 How the Texas trial changed the story of abortion rights in America
评估早期子宫内膜癌手术期间前哨淋巴结切除的新试验昆士兰大学的研究人员获得了 310 万美元的资助，用于一项可能彻底改变子宫内膜癌治疗的试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/New-trial-toassess-sentinel-lymph-node-removal-during-surgery-for-early-stage-endometrial-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/New-trial-toassess-sentinel-lymph-node-removal-during-surgery-for-early-stage-endometrial-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89cf802c-913e-487b-8367-c012209ea998 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 10:24:00 -0400 New trial to assess sentinel lymph node removal during surgery for early-stage endometrial cancer
佐剂鼻内疫苗有望对 COVID-19 产生持久免疫力尽管全球关注的大部分问题已经平息，但 COVID-19 仍然是一个非常现实的威胁，特别是对于免疫系统受损或 65 岁以上的人来说。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Adjuvanted-intranasal-vaccine-shows-promise-for-long-having-immunity-to-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Adjuvanted-intranasal-vaccine-shows-promise-for-long-having-immunity-to-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed65e2a8-1b2d-445b-9b60-06f7646810e0 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 10:22:00 -0400 Adjuvanted intranasal vaccine shows promise for long-lasting immunity to COVID-19
研究显示，威尔士的母乳喂养率在大流行期间有所增加斯旺西大学领导的一项研究显示，在大流行期间，威尔士的母乳喂养率有所上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Breastfeeding-rates-in-Wales-increased-during-the-pandemic-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Breastfeeding-rates-in-Wales-increased-during-the-pandemic-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d82b091f-2899-4065-8b33-5fac7d0e9278 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 10:21:00 -0400 Breastfeeding rates in Wales increased during the pandemic, study reveals
Metrion Biosciences 宣布推出良好实验室规范 (GLP) hERG 筛查服务专业离子通道合同研究和药物发现公司 Metrion Biosciences Limited 今天宣布，已收到英国药品和保健品监管机构 (MHRA) 的通知，该公司现已成为英国 GLP（良好实验室规范）合规成员因此，能够向全球生命科学界提供符合 GLP 要求的 hERG 离子通道筛选服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Metrion-Biosciences-announces-launch-of-Good-Laboratory-Practice-(GLP)-hERG-Screening-Service.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Metrion-Biosciences-announces-launch-of-Good-Laboratory-Practice-(GLP)-hERG-Screening-Service.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84747eca-0b58-46fc-8187-de95ff3e27cf Mon, 07 Aug 2023 10:16:00 -0400 Metrion Biosciences announces launch of Good Laboratory Practice (GLP) hERG Screening Service
